bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with mid modulus fibers, Dyad Plus T700/FRP lay-up, Tri/TT frame, NACA compliant profiles, chainstay-mounted rear brake, internal cable routing, integrated seat post clamp design, seat tube with full rear wheel recess, flat-oval top tube, aerofoil seatstays, PressFit 30 BB shell, rear-entry horizontal dropouts with axle-position adjustment bolts

components.description: Windshield aero full carbon with rear-facing/enclosed front brake for reduced aerodynamic drag, with brake pad adjustment ports
American Classic 420 Aero 3 wheelset, 18/24H, 34mm aero rims, RD-205/Micro 58 hubs with stainless steel cartridge bearings including QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 700x23c, folding (Vittoria Rubino 650 x 23c for XS)
SRAM Force Rear and Rival braze-on front
Vision Trimax double with Press Fit 30, 52/38T, 170mm (XS), 172.5mm (S) ,175mm (M/L), 177.5mm (XL)
Profile Design T3+ Drop-bend carbon fiber extensions with SVET ZERO carbon base bar, 31.8 x 400mm (XS/S/M), 420mm (L/XL)
Profile Design Aris, 3D forged 6061 alloy, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 80mm (XS), 90mm (S/M), 100mm (L/XL)
Jamis Aero carbon post with integrated seat post clamp
Cobb Cycling V-Flow Plus with hollow chromoly-moly rails
Tektro R725 forged alloy hidden U-type TT calipers with SwissStop cartridge pads and Tektro TL-720 aero brake levers
